prompt: A benevolent Caucasian male superhero, Devin, also known as Ashtray Man, stands at 6'3", completely bald due to past lung cancer, his brown eyes conveying a calm, serious demeanor. His expression is stoic and determined (determined expression:1.4), reflecting his unwavering commitment to his cause. The overall style should be semi-realistic, with a focus on dynamic action and a slightly desaturated color palette (desaturated colors:1.1) to emphasize the seriousness of his mission.
